com.davemorrissey.labs.subscaleview

Class SubsamplingScaleImageView.DefaultOnStateChangedListener

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.davemorrissey.labs.subscaleview.SubsamplingScaleImageView.DefaultOnStateChangedListener
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SubsamplingScaleImageView.OnStateChangedListener
    Enclosing class:
    SubsamplingScaleImageView

    public static class SubsamplingScaleImageView.DefaultOnStateChangedListener
extends Object
implements SubsamplingScaleImageView.OnStateChangedListener
    Default implementation of SubsamplingScaleImageView.OnStateChangedListener. This does nothing in any method.

    • Method Detail

      • onCenterChanged

        public void onCenterChanged(PointF newCenter,
                            int origin)
        Description copied from interface: SubsamplingScaleImageView.OnStateChangedListener
        The source center has been changed. This can be a result of panning or zooming.
        Specified by:
        onCenterChanged in interface SubsamplingScaleImageView.OnStateChangedListener
        Parameters:
        newCenter - The new source center point.
        origin - Where the event originated from - one of SubsamplingScaleImageView.ORIGIN_ANIM, SubsamplingScaleImageView.ORIGIN_TOUCH.

      • onScaleChanged

        public void onScaleChanged(float newScale,
                           int origin)
        Description copied from interface: SubsamplingScaleImageView.OnStateChangedListener
        The scale has changed. Use with SubsamplingScaleImageView.getMaxScale() and SubsamplingScaleImageView.getMinScale() to determine whether the image is fully zoomed in or out.
        Specified by:
        onScaleChanged in interface SubsamplingScaleImageView.OnStateChangedListener
        Parameters:
        newScale - The new scale.
        origin - Where the event originated from - one of SubsamplingScaleImageView.ORIGIN_ANIM, SubsamplingScaleImageView.ORIGIN_TOUCH.
